message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $80?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think $80 is a bit low for this product. I can do $110, which is a compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer. What do you think?
I appreciate the compromise, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $95?
I like the idea of meeting in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. That way, I can still make a bit of a profit, but also make the deal work for you. What do you think?
